p: Data extracted from patient records included age, sex, comorbid conditions, symptoms at onset, time from onset of symptoms to hospital admission, vital signs at admission, laboratory test results during hospitalisation, computed tomography (CT) imaging findings, virus clearance time, treatments (duration and dosage), other infections, and clinical outcomes. The record included the field “exposure to Wuhan”, defined as travel to Wuhan City, Hubei, or close contact with someone recently arrived from Wuhan City.
